title: Student Portal Access
question: How can I access the student portal?
answer: You can access the student portal through the SorSU website using your student ID and default password provided upon enrollment.

title: Reset Password
question: I forgot my student portal password, what should I do?
answer: Use the 'Forgot Password' option on the login page or visit the IT Office to reset your account credentials.

title: Email Account
question: Does SorSU provide school email accounts?
answer: Yes. Official email accounts are given to enrolled students and active faculty for academic communication.

title: System Maintenance
question: Why canâ€™t I access the portal?
answer: The portal may be undergoing scheduled maintenance. Try again later or check announcements for updates.

title: IT Support
question: How can I contact IT support?
answer: You may contact the IT Office through its official email itservices@sorsu.edu.ph or visit the campus IT Helpdesk.

title: Wi-Fi Access
question: How can I connect to the campus Wi-Fi?
answer: Use your student or employee ID to log in to the SorSU Wi-Fi network. Contact IT if you experience issues.
